content: from * to * until eor 28 sts as you come across them remove all markers but bor marker 45 k2tog until eor 14 sts 46 k2tog until eor 7 sts you should have 7 sts left on your needles remove the bor marker and use a darning needle to finish your hat and weave in your ends enjoy your brand-new beanie ♡ i spent 5 weeks working on a small sheep farm in strandebarm no my wonderful roommate kristien right and i left ate countless wild blueberries while exploring the forests & mountains 3 colorwork chart light on dark key c2r c2l k2tog tip for some of the c2l stitches row 11 & 29 the cable will begin on the right and end on the left of the st marker remove the marker place the next st on the cable needle knit the st after that place the marker back on the needle and knit the st from the cable needle 4 colorwork chart dark on light key c2r c2l k2tog tip for some of the c2l stitches row 11 & 29 the cable will begin on the right and end on the left of the st marker remove the marker place the next st on the cable needle knit the st after that place the marker back on the needle and knit the st from the cable needle 5
